Dear Harold
I have reviewed the file of correspondence which you
recently sent me with respect to the claim of Miss Ruth
Nusbaum and have concluded that she has no valid claim,
Accordingly, I have prepared the enclosed letter to her
solicitor. Frankly, I seriously doubt that you will hear
anything further from her or from him.
Sincerely
Leonard H. Marks
Enclosure
